description: While the winter league proceeds with only four teams, hopes for the sport’s future rest in part on a baseball academy and school for young players on the island.
title: Battling Baseball’s Decline in Puerto Rico
title_page: Battling Baseball’s Decline in Puerto Rico - The New York Times
maintext:
Slide 1 of 14,
The storied winter league in Puerto Rico has shrunk as baseball has ebbed into decline on the island. Four years ago the season was canceled, but this year four teams are playing. None is in San Juan, the capital, however.
